languages.text: The character may improve any trained {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} even if their {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} or origin does not allow it.

The character may improve any trained {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} even if their {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} or origin does not allow it.

languages.text: Персонаж может улучшить {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристику{/g}, в которой достиг мастерства, даже если {g|Encyclopedia:Career}архетип{/g} или призвание этого не позволяют.
languages.original_text: The character may improve any trained {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} even if their {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} or origin does not allow it.

traits.locale_text: Персонаж может улучшить характеристику, в которой достиг мастерства, даже если доктрина или призвание этого не позволяют.

languages.text: Der Charakter kann jede ausgebildete {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaft{/g} auch dann verbessern, wenn sein {g|Encyclopedia:Career}Archetyp{/g} oder seine Herkunft dies nicht zulässt.
languages.original_text: The character may improve any trained {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} even if their {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} or origin does not allow it.

traits.locale_text: Der Charakter kann jede ausgebildete {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaft{/g} verbessern, auch wenn seine {g|Encyclopedia:Career}Doktrin{/g} oder Herkunft dies nicht zulässt.

languages.text: Le personnage peut améliorer n'importe quelle {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristique{/g} formée même si son {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archétype{/g} ou son origine ne le permet pas.
languages.original_text: The character may improve any trained {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} even if their {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} or origin does not allow it.

traits.locale_text: Le personnage peut améliorer n'importe quelle {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristique{/g} formée même si sa {g|Encyclopedia:Career}doctrine{/g} ou son origine ne le permet pas.

languages.text: 即便是在{g|Encyclopedia:Career}职业{/g}或出身不允许的情况下，角色也可以提升所有训练过的{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}。
languages.original_text: The character may improve any trained {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} even if their {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} or origin does not allow it.

traits.locale_text: 即便是在{g|Encyclopedia:Career}职业{/g}或出身不允许的情况下，角色也可以提升所有训练过的{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}。

languages.text: El personaje puede mejorar cualquier {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}característica{/g} entrenada aunque su {g|Encyclopedia:Career}arquetipo{/g} u origen no lo permitan.
languages.original_text: The character may improve any trained {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} even if their {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} or origin does not allow it.

traits.locale_text: El personaje puede mejorar cualquier {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}característica{/g} entrenada aunque su {g|Encyclopedia:Career}arquetipo{/g} u origen no lo permitan.

languages.text: キャラクターは、{g|Encyclopedia:Career}タイプ{/g}や出生で認められない場合でも、強化{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}を鍛えることができる。
languages.original_text: The character may improve any trained {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} even if their {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} or origin does not allow it.

traits.locale_text: キャラクターは、{g|Encyclopedia:Career}タイプ{/g}や出生で認められない場合でも、強化{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}を鍛えることができる。

languages.text: Karakter, eğittiği bir {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliği{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Career}arketipi{/g} veya kökeni izin vermese bile geliştirebilir.
languages.original_text: The character may improve any trained {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} even if their {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} or origin does not allow it.
